function (address,uint256,string memory,string memory) external returns (contract NovaToken)

params._balances: {uint256[]} Array of balances corresponding to presale addresses.

lockPresaleBalances().return: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

transferControl(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newController: The address to transfer ownership to.

balanceOf(address).notice: Returns the token holder balance at the current block

balanceOfAt(address,uint256).notice: Returns the token holder balance the the given block number

createCloneToken(uint256,string,string).notice: Clones Nova Token at the given snapshot block

enableMasterTransfers(bool).notice: Enable or block transfers - to be called in case of emergency

enableTransfers(bool).notice: Enable or block transfers - to be called in case of emergency

finishMinting().notice: Lock the minting of Nova Tokens - to be called after the presale

importPresaleBalances(address[],uint256[.notice: Import presale balances before the start of the token sale. After importing balances, lockPresaleBalances() has to be called to prevent further modification of presale balances.

lockPresaleBalances().notice: Lock presale balances after successful presale balance import

mint(address,uint256).notice: Token creation functions - can only be called by the tokensale controller during the tokensale period

totalSupply().notice: Returns the total Nova token supply at the current block

totalSupplyAt(uint256).notice: Returns the total Nova token supply at the given block number
